Necessary Trait Values:

Trait Description
Trait Group
Instructions.Tips:
Tips:
It's recommended to keep trait sprites 28x28 or smaller. Any size works, but larger ones can experience issues.
KeyGUI includes a feature called "Partner Traits". Any traits that you select as partner traits for your trait will automatically be added to any unit that has your trait.
This is useful for combining special trait effects like immortality with your custom trait.
